text: Aegiae or Aigiai () or Aegaeae or Aigaiai (Αἱγαῖαι) was a town of ancient Laconia, at the distance of 30 stadia from Gythium, supposed by Strabo to be the same as the Homeric AugeiaeΑν̓γελαί, It possessed a temple and lake of Poseidon. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Laconia Category:Former populated places in Greece
title: Aegiae
